app_name: Car Run Racing ğŸš— Super Car Race
app_detail:
Race with JET POWERED Muscle cars and dominate the streets in this crazy adventure runner! 

Features EXTREME jumps and outrageous stunts! Flip, Jump and Grind tricks with your ride to win and become the ultimate stuntman! Race down the hill and tap your way to top speed, before launching into the sky with your jetpack wings to earn extra coins.

KEY FEATURES
â˜… AMAZING Hot Rod and Muscle Cars!!
â˜… Colorful HD graphics!
â˜… DODGE traffic!
â˜… FAST wacky FUN!
â˜… UPGRADE your boosts and powerups!
â˜… UNLOCK your rides!
â˜… BOOST your cars with super jets!

GAMEPLAY
- Swipe to change lanes or to jump and duck over and under obstacles.
- Tap when going downhill to build up speed
- Double tap to activate your hover jets that act as a shield
- Endless race until you die

TIPS
- The further you go the higher the score
- Use powerups to get more coins

Collect all the power ups and DOMINATE the hi-scores! Modify your rides with jetpack wings to become a traffic racing legend.

NO IN APP PURCHASES

Download now and show off your stunts!
